ygData.subject: Re: Zardus
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus nods, looking into the hallway. It went off to both sides, and completely darkened after two yards in either direction. Allright. Lets go, but stay

::Zardus::

Zardus nods, looking into the hallway. It went off to both sides, and completely darkened after two yards in either direction.

"Allright. Lets go, but stay close and be careful."

He taps a button on his gun and a light turns on, illuminating the empty corrdor. Zardus steps forward and enters the ship, slowly and cautiously walking down the hallway. His scanners reported that there was something living in the ship, but what or where it was wasn't scannable.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::Wheeljack nods::
> Wheeljack: I'll try.
> ::He tries to make some scans, but for some reason he couldn't get anything::
> Wheeljack: I don't understand it. My scanners aren't working.
> Hurricane: I don't like the look of this.
> ::He keeps his horns ready::
